## Simulate Data From The Acceptance and Action Questionaire

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
set.seed(1)
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
library(ggplot2)

# sample size
N <- 25

# simulate "avoidancease", a latent variable with a normal scale
avoidance = runif(N,3,4)

# simulate latent responses to 9 questions about avoidance for baseline
b3 = .32
e3 = rnorm(N,0,1)
l3 = b3*avoidance+e3

b6 = .49
e6 = rnorm(N,0,1)
l6 = b6*avoidance+e6

b8 = .56
e8 = rnorm(N,0,1)
l8 = b8*avoidance+e8

b16 = .50
e16 = rnorm(N,0,1)
l16 = b16*avoidance+e16

b19 = .59
e19 = rnorm(N,0,1)
l19 = b19*avoidance+e19

b20 = .36
e20 = rnorm(N,0,1)
l20 = b20*avoidance+e20

b24 = .73
e24 = rnorm(N,0,1)
l24 = b24*avoidance+e24

b28 = .48
e28 = rnorm(N,0,1)
l28 = b28*avoidance+e28

b31 = .48
e31 = rnorm(N,0,1)
l31 = b31*avoidance+e31

dat_prep_A <- data_frame(l31, l28, l20, l19, l16, l8, l6, l3)

dat_raw_A <- mutate_all(dat_prep, cut, breaks = 7, labels = FALSE) %>% 
  mutate(post = 0)


# simulate "avoidancease", a latent variable with a normal scale
avoidance = runif(N,0,1)

# simulate latent responses to 9 questions about avoidance for follow-up
b3 = .32
e3 = rnorm(N,0,1)
l3 = b3*avoidance+e3

b6 = .49
e6 = rnorm(N,0,1)
l6 = b6*avoidance+e6

b8 = .56
e8 = rnorm(N,0,1)
l8 = b8*avoidance+e8

b16 = .50
e16 = rnorm(N,0,1)
l16 = b16*avoidance+e16

b19 = .59
e19 = rnorm(N,0,1)
l19 = b19*avoidance+e19

b20 = .36
e20 = rnorm(N,0,1)
l20 = b20*avoidance+e20

b24 = .73
e24 = rnorm(N,0,1)
l24 = b24*avoidance+e24

b28 = .48
e28 = rnorm(N,0,1)
l28 = b28*avoidance+e28

b31 = .48
e31 = rnorm(N,0,1)
l31 = b31*avoidance+e31

dat_prep_B <- data_frame(l31, l28, l20, l19, l16, l8, l6, l3) 

dat_raw <- bind_rows(dat_prep_A, dat_prep_B) %>%
  mutate_all(cut, breaks = 7, labels = FALSE) %>%
  mutate(obs = 1:50)


dat_raw %>%
  gather(key = item, value = score, -obs) %>%
  group_by(obs) %>%
  summarise(total_score = sum(score)) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = obs, y = total_score)) +
    geom_point()


```
